data.system_settings: Samsung Galaxy S7 edge (SM-G935F), Android Nougat 7.0
data.actual_result: The app switches back to the Online section.
data.expected_result: The same section should be selected.
data.short_description: The app switches to online from all, pending, suggestions and blocked when changing screen orientation
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to Friends - Select a section other than Online (All, Pending, Suggestions or Blocked) - Turn your device from portrait to landscape mode (or to portrait if you are in landscape) - Notice that the app switches back to Online
